00007 #pragma once
00008 
00009 #include <cstddef>
00010 #include <iterator>
00011 
00012 namespace lsf {
00013 namespace container {
00014 namespace detail {
00015 
00017 // QueueState
00019 template <typename ElemType, typename SizeType>
00020 class QueueState {
00021 public:
00022     using value_type = ElemType;
00023     using size_type = SizeType;
00024     using this_type = QueueState;
00025 
00026 public:
00027     void Init(size_t byte_size) {
00028         _size = 0;
00029         _max_size = (byte_size - sizeof(this_type)) / sizeof(value_type);
00030         _elem_byte_size = sizeof(value_type);
00031         _head_pos = 0;
00032         _tail_pos = 0;
00033     }
00034 
00035     static size_t CalcByteSize(size_type size) { return (size + 1) * sizeof(value_type) + sizeof(this_type); }
00036     static size_t CalcElemByteSize(void const *ptr) { return ((this_type const *)ptr)->ElemByteSize(); }
00037     static size_t CalcElemMaxSize(void const *ptr) { return ((this_type const *)ptr)->max_size(); }
00038 
00039     size_type size() const { return (_tail_pos - _head_pos + _max_size) % _max_size; }
00040     size_type max_size() const { return _max_size - 1; }
00041     size_t ElemByteSize() const { return _elem_byte_size; }
00042 
00043     bool empty() const { return _head_pos == _tail_pos; }
00044     bool full() const { return _head_pos == (_tail_pos + 1) % _max_size; }
00045 
00046     value_type *GetDataPtr(size_type pos) const { return (value_type *)(this + 1) + pos % _max_size; }
00047 
00048     size_type &GetHeadPos() { return _head_pos; }
00049     size_type &GetTailPos() { return _tail_pos; }
00050 
00051     size_type CalcAbsolutePos(size_type pos) const { return (pos + _max_size) % _max_size; }
00052 
00053     void HeadPosInc() { _head_pos = (_head_pos + 1) % _max_size; }
00054     void HeadPosDec() { _head_pos = (_head_pos - 1 + _max_size) % _max_size; }
00055     void TailPosInc() { _tail_pos = (_tail_pos + 1) % _max_size; }
00056     void TailPosDec() { _tail_pos = (_tail_pos - 1 + _max_size) % _max_size; }
00057 
00058 private:
00059     size_type _size;
00060     size_type _max_size;  // notice: here use one node to mark end of queue
00061     size_type _elem_byte_size;
00062     size_type _head_pos;
00063     size_type _tail_pos;
00064 };
00065 
00067 // QueueIterator
00069 // forward
00070 template <typename ElemType, typename SizeType>
00071 class QueueIterator : public std::iterator<std::bidirectional_iterator_tag, ElemType>{
00072 public:
00073     using base_type = std::iterator<std::bidirectional_iterator_tag, ElemType>;
00074     using value_type = typename base_type::value_type;
00075     using pointer = typename base_type::pointer;
00076     using reference = typename base_type::reference;
00077     using difference_type = typename base_type::difference_type;
00078     using state_type = QueueState<ElemType, SizeType>;
00079     using size_type = SizeType;
00080 
00081 public:
00082     // constructor
00083     QueueIterator(state_type *ptr_state = nullptr, size_type idx = 0) : _ptr_state(ptr_state), _pos(0) {
00084         // convert relative idx to abs pos
00085         if (_ptr_state != nullptr) {
00086             _pos = _ptr_state->CalcAbsolutePos(_ptr_state->GetHeadPos() + idx);
00087         }
00088     }
00089 
00090     // member funcs
00091     QueueIterator &operator++() {
00092         _pos = _ptr_state->CalcAbsolutePos(_pos + 1);
00093         return *this;
00094     }
00095 
00096     QueueIterator &operator--() {
00097         _pos = _ptr_state->CalcAbsolutePos(_pos - 1);
00098         return *this;
00099     }
00100 
00101     pointer operator->() const { return _ptr_state->GetDataPtr(_pos); }
00102     reference operator*() const { return *(_ptr_state->GetDataPtr(_pos)); }
00103 
00104     QueueIterator operator++(int) {
00105         QueueIterator tmp = *this;
00106         ++*this;
00107         return tmp;
00108     }
00109     QueueIterator operator--(int) {
00110         QueueIterator tmp = *this;
00111         --*this;
00112         return tmp;
00113     }
00114 
00115     bool operator==(QueueIterator const& rhs) { return _ptr_state == rhs._ptr_state && _pos == rhs._pos; }
00116     bool operator!=(QueueIterator const& rhs) { return !(_ptr_state == rhs._ptr_state && _pos == rhs._pos); }
00117 
00118 private:
00119     state_type *_ptr_state;
00120     size_type _pos;
00121 };
00122 
00123 }  // end of namespace detail
00124 }  // end of namespace container
00125 }  // end of namespace lsf
